free: #e (He) rushes about for things about the road and others.
#c (為了)路的事情和別的事情東跑西跑。

free: #e He is busy not only with our things.
#c 他要忙的事情並不是只有我們的事。
#n 可簡省為mai yu wama zata=ay lanas-na

free: #e There will be things about (the person who passed away).

#n 原本要講 yau lanas zau zana ni qawi=ay (qawi ‘leave’)

#c 我們明天全部要回去新社。

#c 他說他只好三號晚上才可以回去。

free: #e Between the two, only (the fan) is lighter; the water cooler is heavy.
#c 這兩個只有那個(電風扇)比較輕，飲水機很重。
#n azu inengat Ribang zau是指「這東西不是很輕」或「這東西好像很輕」，差別在於語調不同，前者重音在inengat，而後者重音在azu。

free: #e Abin said, “I will also go back on (June) 3.”
#c 阿明說：「我也是三號回去。」

free: #e He said (he) would also go back.

free: #e If he has work, I think (it would be better for him) not to go back.
#c 如果他有工作的話，我想(阿明)不要回去(比較好)。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 潘金妹, Imuy, female, 1952-10-25

free: #e He said, “I’ve already taken (several days’) leave.”

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)

free: #e If so, it would be better that all of us went back.
#c 那樣的話，我們全部都回去也好啦。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 潘金妹, Imuy, female, 1952-10-25

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 潘金妹, Imuy, female, 1952-10-25

free: #e It would be good (for all of us) to go back; otherwise we would feel sorry.
#c 回去也好，不然不好意思。

free: #n 「誰」在此指別人。此句意為「都是自己人」。
